 Partially. It is arguable as are most issues that have not yet been proven factual.
 
 I would argue that, as stated, this issue cannot be settled with any certainty. There may have been sites that were created and destroyed that would be more annoying if resurrected. It is highly improbable that all sites that have been created could be evaluated in one lifetime.
 
 The degree of annoyance being a matter of opinion, the www.gop.com emoticon_xhoho website may be more annoying to the liberals than any other.
 
 Besides, it no longer is  annoying to me. It was, when I was there, but is not  now.
 
 I will say that is was the most annoying website that I can remember visiting.
